website_summaries.verdict: Firm enough for support in any sleeping position, yet soft enough to cradle your spine and joints without pain, pressure points, or tingles. Certified free of any harmful chemicals. Available in twin through CA King. 10 inches thick.
pros: Four layers, and every one of them adds to your comfort
On top, a layer of latex foam provides bounce and firmness without heat or the dreaded "quicksand" feeling of traditional memory foam
Next, a layer of memory foam for support, then a layer of transition foam to provide even weight distribution, and finally, a base of support foam
Removable, washable cover encloses the entire thing
You won't be disturbed by your partner rolling over
cons: While most owners praised the lack of heat buildup, a few still felt the mattress slept hot

website_summaries.verdict: A high-end mattress with a four-layer support system.
pros: Uses a support system designed to mirror your body’s natural shape at 33 specific points for more restorative sleep
A great choice for sleepers with back pain as it’s endorsed by the American Chiropractic Association (ACA)
cons: In the higher price range for a memory foam mattress

customer_reviews.title: Don’t by casper
customer_reviews.text: We read several reviews and decided to give Casper a Try. The result was terrible. The mattress is crocked, and tilts up on every corner, the different foam layers are uneven. The only positive thing about our experience, was buying this through amazon, that took care of us as customers. Casper’s call center and service, said their was nothing to be done, about a defaulty mattress because it was not handled directly by them. Terrible service and product.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Cibils

customer_reviews.title: Better for sleeping alone
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable when sleeping alone. When sleeping with another source of weight, yes including your dog, it seems to cave in towards one another. I wake up feeling great and refreshed when I sleep alone but when I sleep with the dog in my bed, I wake up with an achy back. It’s like it sucks you towards the other source of weight in your bed. The mattress does seem to keep you cool and doesn’t transfer motion. Seems to contour to your body so you don’t toss and turn as much. I would rate this mattress 4-5 stars if I always slept alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give Amazon customer service a five star rating. However the Casper bed get a 1 star because there isn’t a 0, bed did not form properly when unpackaged, smells horrible, Standard king size sheet won’t fit and the mattress thickness is not 10-inches, refer to pic.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction, great marketing.
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrible for a week. Softer than expected which is bad after back surgery. Edges have no support. I bought the sheets, duvet and all and the quality isn't what they advertise. It's mediocre and the sheets son't stay in place on edges, grays don't match. Looked amazing in the ads, but it's not great for the price
customer_reviews.author: PubAmazonID

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell doesn't go away
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable but it stinks! The chemical smell is still there after 75 days...I've washed the sheets and the mattress protector many times hoping to help it but still gives me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen S.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the whole hype of being best mattress is about
customer_reviews.text: Too soft for me and I don’t get any support. Not sure what the whole hype of being best mattress is about. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: RXRV

customer_reviews.title: Casper is a No Go
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Was highly disappointed. Too soft. Corners still roll up after 45 days. The mattress is also thin and is not the 10 inches or so as described. It is also too light and the sheets do not fit properly and come out from underneath. Every day making the bed is a big pain. Would not spend money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Bodeau

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep my spine aligned.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. As a side sleeper, it doesn't keep me in alignment. 6' tall 215lbs. It's uncomfortable to stay on one side too long and my lower back always hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for an even better prise
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using this mattress for about 6 weeks now and love it. We replaced a 10 year old traditional mattress and I was not relishing spending three grand or more on another mattress. So we took a chance on this mattress and it is great. We were already using a 2" memory foam topper on the old mattress so we went ahead and put it on this one. Makes it softer if that is what you like. Not sure it needed it, but we had it so we use it. I hope to get many years of good sleep from this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing experience / quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how poorly designed this mattress was given its high consumer reports ratings and all the awards it has won. It is extremely soft (if you like a firm mattress or have a bad back I would NOT recommend it). The corners of the mattress are so weak that they collapse when you cover them with a fitted sheet. And after three days out of the box it still smells like a tire. I ended up returning it and am sincerely disappointed with this product. I think it would be fair to pay $200 for this mattress, but it is overpriced given the quality of its design and manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: PGH

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable to sleep on. Husbands a back sleeper I’m a side sleeper. We both have hip & shoulder pain. The Casper king bed is supportive yet soft enough to cradle the body without sinking into the bed. Awesome nights sleep. Glad I did my research for months before deciding on this winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to sleep on, but started waking up with back pain every morning after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable to sleep on, but for some reason, both my wife and I have started to wake up with lower back pain after almost 2 months of sleeping on it. Both of us rotate between our backs and sides. We will be returning it. For what it's worth - Amazon is making the return process extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Do NOT buy this
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Do NOT buy this. It can not be returned easily as it does not fit in original box and not easy to package into a box for return. We bought it as Amazon said it could be returned, but now it turns out that is quite a tedious process even to get it packaged before return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overrated - Causes me pain
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would get used to this mattress or that it would begin to accommodate to my body over time, but it has not gotten better in the six months that I've been sleeping on it. I wake up with a sore back (if I sleep on my back) or sore hips and shoulders (if I sleep on my side) every morning. It's hard and uncomfortable and hot. I really wish I had purchased a coil mattress with a pillowtop.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kramper

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bed I’ve ever slept in
customer_reviews.text: I originally learned about the Casper bed while on vacation last year. It was the first time that I ever took the sheets off to look at a label of a bed! It is incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: matt and tj

customer_reviews.title: Comfort fades quickly!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for 9 months. We now refer to it as "the torture chamber." It started out great, but quickly lost its support. My wife and I both experience shoulder pain only while laying on this mattress. We are very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: matt d.

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous price for a ridiculous mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for about a year now and getting a good night sleep is out the window. Back pain, restless sleep and being in a bad mood all day because of it. I wish I could get a refund on this mattress. $1000.00 for something that turns out to be like this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Miller

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM CASPER - Tilted corners, low quality
customer_reviews.text: We made the mistake of buying the Casper mattress. The foams used are not evenly distributed in the mattress resulting in uneven corners and significant tilting. We decided to return the first one and ask for a replacement which was even worse than the first one. I would stay away from Casper.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: Contemplated getting this for 6 months before buying. Effortless set up, and I have been getting some of the best sleep I have gotten in years.
customer_reviews.author: jt3317

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price, But I'm Not Allowed To Post Shipment Experience
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the Casper Mattress go on sale, I couldn't resist taking advantage of the opportunity. Amazing price, Outstanding Mattress. Regrettably, Amazon's guidelines prevent me from sharing my shipment experience. So I can't tell you if the packaging came damaged or opened. This is regrettable, as it doesn't allow potential buyers to understand the entire purchase process...but I imagine most consumers are smart enough to read between the lines despite Amazon limiting feedback. If not, the rest of social media isn't censored.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry T. Tidd

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So many reviews, so many memory foam mattresses out there. My husband and I researched until we were dizzy! We finally made a decision on the Casper based on a youtube video we saw. We were not disappointed! And the black Friday $200 off didn't hurt either. I went ahead and added my old memory foam topper to the mix and the result is perfect. Before it was a little too firm but now it is just right. This was a good choice based on our preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first, now lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: What a bummer. I have had this mattress for a little over a year now, and at first I absolutely loved it. A few months ago, I started noticing that I would wake up a few days with pain in my lower back. Unfortunately, now it's much more frequently, and to the point where I look forward to going out of town so I can sleep on something else. It seems I don't have many options at this point, since it is well past the trial period, but I don't feel comfortable recommending this mattress to my friends since it worked for me through the trial period.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wickman

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I saw this mattress had good reviews on Consumer Reports, and not bad here, so I thought I'd try it. It was far too stiff for me. I could sleep on my back a few hours no problem, but eventually I switch to my side, and it was just too uncomfortable (I'm 165 lbs if that helps). If you like stiff, you might like it. Otherwise no issues with odor, quality, or anything else. The return process went flawlessly for me. Called 1-888-280-4331, asked for Large Item Returns Department (as mentioned in questions section), and probably took 10-15 minutes to get everything processed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: No Casper 100 night warranty
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Casper, first one was a queen and now a king. My only issue is casper does not back the 100 night warranty or pick up if purchased through Amazon. You may save a little but you better decide if you like it before 30 days. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Love it after only one night!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bf...We received our mattress yesterday and opened it and it got large and inflated to size immediately. Slept on it last night and my boyfriend said he felt amazing and woke with zero back pain. Both of us also slept through the night without waking up. So far.. 5 stars! I have a $4,000 tempurpedic my house and this feels like my tempurpedic did when I first bought it but it’s 1/4 the price. Also very quiet.. his old mattress squeaked and drove me nuts.. you couldn’t turn over in the bed without hearing it squeak. No more.. quiet and restful sleep. I bought the $995 queen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible upper back pain
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to get this Casper matress after reading so many positive reviews! It was awful. It gave us both upper back pain/neck pain. We slept better on our old matress which was way overdue to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN G.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress due to lower back pain and glowing reviews. But sadly this made my back pain worse. I stuck it out a bit since a had 100 days and some things take time, but still no good.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: I waited so long to afford this mattress and now I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping that maybe it will get better but it's too firm and causes pain in my hip and legs. I'm a side sleeper. I even paid the extra money for the brand name box support and it does not help. I'm 72 years old and have peripheral neuropathy. I had such high hopes for this as a relief for my pain while sleeping but I guess it's not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up.  Just make sure you don't cut the mattress when removing the packing.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is not having any issues with this mattress. I feel it is a little soft but I haven't had an opportunity to get used to it yet. I'm hoping I love it as much as he when I am able to use it more. It is at another house we don't visit often. I love the foam-type mattresses because when one of us move, the other isn't affected by the bed moving. These beds don't move.
customer_reviews.author: Kalene Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: Not the mattress for me, I’ve already gotten a refund. I can’t pinpoint exactly why, it’s in the middle as far as firmness, but it just was not comfortable at all. It also seems GROSSLY overpriced...even if it was comfortable for me. 350-500 would be a fair price for the Queen size, 995 is insane. I’ll be sticking to coil mattresses, my10 year old Serta blows this mattress away in the comfort department.
customer_reviews.author: V. Savastano

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think I have EVER slept this good!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I don’t think I have EVER slept this good. This bed changed my life! No more back or shoulder pain (I am a side sleeper) I can even sleep on my stomach which hasn’t happened in years. I don’t want to get out of bed because it’s so comfortable. I recommend this bed to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY HUNDLEY

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off with before I purchased this bed I had been sleeping on this cheap spring mattress for about a year and I haven’t slept through the night in a very l My time. It took about 3 nights to get use to this bed. I have had it about 2 weeks now and it was the best money I’ve ever spent! If you’re looking for a new bed, I highly recommend this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Marketing much better than the product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve slept on this Casper California King for over five months in hopes it’d get better as giving it a genuine good try sleeping on it. I’d slept on. Tempurpedic for twelve years prior and I can testify that this is like comparing apples to oranges. The Rhapsody Tempurpedic was great. Only Tempurpedic is seriously overpriced now with my budget. So based upon the reviews on the Casper and big name advertising it appears the Casper would be a good alternative. What a mistake! I can’t get rid of this Casper soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Casper Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say the product was donated. I had pain in my hips, shoulders, and knees sleeping on the mattress. I even tried turning it 180 degrees without any difference. I went on vacations for 10 days, came back home and within 2 days was not sleeping through the night again. Not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Wandling

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Casper. My first was a queen size and after four years it still looks and feels new. When Me and my wife wanted to get something bigger I went straight for a Casper again. I have destroyed several other mattresses. I had a Serta pillow top spring mattress that broke down in the middle and different brand of memory foam that separated the top layer from the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley McClain

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought a more expensive mattress and within four months, our bodies hurt so much it was difficult to get started in the morning. Dealt with it for a few more months until my husband's back was shot. Decided to give the Casper a try but wasn't sure since it was so much cheaper than the one we had bought. Oh my... we have been able to get out of bed like we're spring chickens! Absolutely the best mattress I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy F. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I was expecting. It’s too firm and I think if the pad was thicker it would contour more to my body. Also, there was a strong chemical smell that has taken a long time to dissipate. Overall, I’m not satisfied with the mattress and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: It became soft over a year and half
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Casper mattress based on good review by a respected consumer magazine. I liked the mattress when new because it has the right firmness for my comfort; however, after a year and half, it has softened significantly on one side where I normally sleep. I had to rotate the mattress so that I sleep in the firmer side of the mattress. That means, I will have another one and half years before I have to buy a new mattress. I think it might be a better value, over a long run, to buy the hybrid type of mattress, we which has springs, from the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Anjiso

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Firm
customer_reviews.text: If you want a "Hard" surface to sleep on this is it. I couldn't believe how hard this was. It was like sleeping on a wooden floor. My husband wanted a firm mattress but Casper was even too hard to him. Amazon was wonderful in getting me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT FALL FOR IT
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Only comfortable for about 2 months, if that. Sadly we have been sleeping on this piece of junk for almost 2 years since we cannot afford another mattress. This was a special gift I got for my boyfriend because he works in construction and has a bad back from 2 car accidents (neither one was his fault, just in the wrong place at the wrong time). Casper customer service is not helpful. They are impossible to get a hold of and they offer no realistic, viable, fair solutions. It is absurd how fraudulent and unethical this company is. They charge thousands of dollars to sleep on the industries crappiest foam. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: It's good and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I am 76 years old and arthritis is a problem. I bought the mattress to replace another brand which was only 3 years old because of hip and shoulder pains. The casper has helped me because it is more "form fitting" and gives me support where I need it. It did emit an oder for the first few days but that quickly subsided and now is absent. I would buy the mattress again (but at my age hope not to!).
customer_reviews.author: Brookranger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the most comfortable mattress I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Bad chose to buy beds online.
customer_reviews.text: the bed was not what I expected it was ok at first but slowly it became to soft in areas of the shoulder & neck & uncomfortable in the end I regret getting this bed, no more buying beds online unless I can try it first. Bad chose. Plus it is to heavy to ship back. Bad
customer_reviews.author: robert h. kure

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like firm but my hips don't. This one works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W

customer_reviews.title: WORST COMPANY EVER!!! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was fantastic until about 2 years in, then it started sagging horribly causing pain at all joints. I contacted the company about the warranty and basically they refused to help me, period. No return emails, no returned calls. So there may be a 10 year warranty but you will NEVER get them to honor it. Highly dissapointed in Casper I truly expected so much more from a mattress and company I loved in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: GRASSLAND

customer_reviews.title: In my experience just an average bed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this purchase. The bed is not uncomfortable. But it definitely, in my experience, is not as good as a majority of these reviews (and Casper's advertising) state. Really just an average mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Duprey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with the mattress. It's rally comfortable. :) However the bed came 4 days later then it was supposed to. The box was half open. The flaps were open on one end. It basically looked like an elephant sat on it. The instructions and tool to help open it were gone. Frustrating when you make a big purchase like this.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product No wait time for it to become flat Both of us are enjoying an improved night sleep; no tossing Incredibly comfortable Used our existing box spring Check out its rating in Consumers Report Five payment option makes the purchase painless Love my Amazon
customer_reviews.author: barbara cavasmitson

customer_reviews.title: They ignore warranty claims
customer_reviews.text: My mattress has gone from 10 inches to 9 to 9 3/8 inches all across the bed. Yet they ignore my claim I sent in and I have a defective bed. Would you by this type of service after just one year of ownership. If so, .........
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Three Years - Home Sweet Home
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled extensively for work over the years. In the three years I have owned my Casper King Original mattress I have had over 600 hotel nights to compare comfort. I have seen every type of mattress imaginable from those dial the firmness types to the air hybrids in the hotels but find myself always looking forward to sleeping at home in the most comfortable mattress I have ever owned. I don't know how they may have improved them, and probably won't know because I will be keeping this one for many years more.
customer_reviews.author: WinpakBob

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Casper mattress in the master and decided to get one for the guest bedroom cause we love it that much! Just take it out of the box, wait a few minutes and it’s ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Laila Waziri

customer_reviews.title: Mistake trusting 5-star reviews
customer_reviews.text: Sleeps so hot. Got it for my toddler and often sleep in it during his bedtime routine. I wake up in an hour hot, with an aching lower back. To my knowledge this mattress has no cooling elements as do the upper end memory foam mattresses. Unfortunately life got busy and I’m outside the return window. I was sold on all the “5-star reviews” but now i wonder what in the world they’re based on. Don’t be like me. Try one in a store before purchase. Pay a little more for quality. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Support base underneath the foam mattress can dramatically affect the final feel.
customer_reviews.text: Foam mattresses I think are over hyped. I can’t tell much difference between this and a good semi-firm regular spring mattress. The affect of the type of support base underneath the mattress should be given careful consideration.
customer_reviews.author: D Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Excellent customer experience
customer_reviews.text: Read several reviews of competitive offers and decided on Casper; Easy, flawless order and deliver; set up on existing box spring - no odor issues (sometimes a complaint with similar products) and have been sleeping better for > 1 month. A big improvement in depth of sleep and # of times I get out of bed / night (from >2 to 1 every 3 nights...). Should have done this years ago. Highly recommend for athletes looking for better sleep / recovery and anyone with a worn out coil spring mattress. (Am currently purchasing 3 more for other beds in our home...)
customer_reviews.author: PD 63

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: Love my new mattress. I was leary of a foam mattress but with my back problems I seep great on this mattress
customer_reviews.author: msc

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress ever. Heavy but weighs less than the inner spring. Puffed up quickly. Plastic odor was gone quickly. Easier to make the bed now. Great sleep quality
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Calkins

customer_reviews.title: So much pain...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is VERY soft. We tried it for a week and woke up each morning in terrible pain from sinking into such a soft surface. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: EBeall56

customer_reviews.title: Casper mattress
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit firmer than expected. Arm relief area seems same firmness as rest of mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Petitpren

customer_reviews.title: Everything it was said to be
customer_reviews.text: After many years and many good mattresses My wife and I agree that this Casper is by far the most comfortable one we've ever had. We've slept on it for several months just to be sure and have not been disappointed. Considering the small price we paid we're extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Willy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! It’s so comfortable, I have gotten much better nights of sleep and fallen asleep much faster since I got it. I’ll be honest, I thought there was a lot of unjustified hype about this mattress, but I’m a fan now 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: very easy to sleep
customer_reviews.text: We had the same mattress for the last 8 years and didn't have the $ at the time to buy a nice higher end one, but this makes a drastic difference in sleep quality. It's not soft nor hard. It's in between and gives great support. This is the 10 ' original version and we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: chris tozzi

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Who would have thought
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Who would have thought, a mattress in a box could be soo comfortable! Get the box spring also, complements the mattress. Ready to sleep on in 5 min. seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Feels like sleeping on a cloud...
customer_reviews.text: Our teenage son LOVES his new twin mattress. He said it’s like sleeping on a cloud. It’s going to be hard getting him out of bed in the mornings for school!
customer_reviews.author: T D Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the most comfortable mattress I've ever used (over a year now). I'm a back sleeper, so this mattress is perfect. I do sleep on my side sometimes and it's still great. The mattress is firm, but not stiff. Just right. I built a custom bed frame to support mattress. Didn't like quality of Casper's.
customer_reviews.author: P. Comella

customer_reviews.title: This mattress takes my body aches away!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm so thankful a friend told me about this mattress. It's my husband and my favorite mattress now. It does have a smell. Air it out as long as you can so you don't smell it once you put your sheets on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings...
customer_reviews.text: The bed is really comfortable to sleep on, but it has a strong chemical oder. We did everything to try eliminating it, and the smell is only getting stronger......
customer_reviews.author: wai

customer_reviews.title: Sold!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is sturdy which seems a bit of an odd description. Initially I feared the purchase was a mistake but after a week I was sold. If your dream bed is one you sink into you may wish to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: MOBills

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive
customer_reviews.text: My partner has had one of these for a number of years and I've always enjoyed sleeping in it when I've stayed with him. When it was time to upgrade my own mattress, I was pleased to find these on sale on Amazon, so I took my opportunity. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Rian Winters

customer_reviews.title: Great bed top to bottom
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable beds I have ever laid in If not the most comfortable This bed is put together and comes apart in 10 minutes at most Incredible design and alot of thought was put into this bed the top of the Mattress liner zips off so you can wash it A very awesome feature
customer_reviews.author: poopooking

customer_reviews.title: Casper Sleep Memory Foam 10 Inch Mattress, Twin XL
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Unpacked, and it reached its full expansion in less than 6 hours. Very comfortable, and does form to your body so there is a plus! I have not woke up with a backache since I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Scovel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My guests have complimented how comfortable the mattress is - super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BayAreaBraves

customer_reviews.title: Comfy mattress, but get the taller one
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very comfortable and I finally got some good sleep in a long time. But I did order a 10 inch and quickly realized I should have gotten the 12. Also, the edges are rounded which doesn’t make it flat to the platform. I did call Casper and they said, that could happen due to the package but it should correct itself in a few weeks. If not, I can exchange. Gonna exchange for the 12 mattress anyway

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable! I’ve had back/neck pain for years and after the first night of sleeping on this bed I feel rested and more limber. I usually wake up countless times throughout the night but I can recall only waking up once. This bed equates to a “medium” on the firmness scale of a mattress. If you are looking for a bed with medium firmness I highly recommend this bed. Casper has an A+ rating from the better business bureau, a non-prorated 10 year warranty & a great customer service team. I did a lot of research on beds and Casper stood out above the rest!
